nodes.text: The Mandalorians: People and Culture is an article in Star Wars Insider 86 about Mandalorian culture. It was written by Karen Traviss and illustrated by Tom Hodges.
No Word for Hero: The Mandalorian Language
The Mandalorian inscriptions on page 25 and 26 of the article translate as "Jango Fett lost his head" and "akod oya akod oya akod oya" respectively.
